  },
}));


export const Home = () => {
  let match = useRouteMatch();
  const classes = useStyles();
  return (
    <User>
      <Grid container className={classes.homeContainer} direction="column">
        <Grid item>
          <ImageSlider />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item>
          {
            courses.map(courses => (
              < CourseCarousel title={courses.title} courses={courses.courses} />
            ))
          }
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </User>
  )
}
